Adapt ideas from paper into captivating social media reels, short clips, music videos, movie trailers, promos, collages, ads, montages, vlogs, stories, intros, slideshows, TV transitions, and even short films!RIVEO IS FOR CONTENT CREATORS WHO WANT TO:* Add keyframes, masks, and blend modes for everything to come together /* Apply special effects, motion effects, 3D text & color grading filters /* Mix images, videos, effects, filters, and more /* Retime videos in slow motion* Access live preview editing & green screen tools /* Bring your film ideas to life /[100+ Special Effects]â€¢ Layer color graded filters, motion, and special effects for unlimited possibilities. Style your footage to look like VHS tape, turn it retro, add glitches or blur out the edges. The possibilities are endless using particle effects like gas, smoke, soap bubbles, cartoon fire, 3D butterflies, broken glass, pencil sketches, halftones, beauty filters, and spooky mist.[Video Filters]â€¢ Enhance your video footage with trendy color grading filters and effects, including Bokeh, Glitch, Cartoon, Fog, Vintage, Sparkles, 90s TV, Old School Camera, Pixelate, Fire, Rain, VHS, Retro, and even a Stranger Things-inspired filter.[Motion Effects]â€¢ Click and drag to add transitions and animations that respond to your movements. Throw fire, water, rain, and more in your videos.[3D Text Effects]â€¢ Get started with text-style presets ranging from chrome to glass to animate your words in 3D. Make text bounce in or have your message pop out. Tweak the settings to make text overlays your own.[Retime Videos]â€¢ Modify a clip's speed, length, and timing with HD motion to create missing frames to make the movement buttery smooth. Add in slow-motion and boomerangs for even more impact.[Keyframe Scenes]â€¢ Specify the start and end of your transitions to create perfect timing. Ramp up the fire, move in an image. Keyframes let you animate what you add to your scene.[Integrated Camera]â€¢ Record, enhance, and share videos with the world using the built-in camera. The integrated workflow makes it easier to create your videos from 15fps to 200fps.[Animated Stickers]â€¢ Enhance your videos with access to a fun variety of Giphy stickers ranging from reactions and memes to weird and celebrities.[Stock Music Library]â€¢ Adding the ideal audio track is essential to making your video go viral. Seamlessly synchronize royalty-free sound with over 100+ trendy audio tracks.[Gesture-Driven UI]â€¢ The devil is in the details. Gesture-driven components make navigating through editor settings intuitive. It is no coincidence that the effect previews update when you scrub the video.[Live Preview]â€¢ Edit videos in real-time using instant filters and special effect previews in real-time. Preview your changes to see how they look on your current scene. And quickly scrub through the video timeline to apply it at the exact moment.[Masking]â€¢ AI-driven masking provides you with a green screen for isolating a silhouette to change the background location.[Export in 4K, 720p]Render your creations in 720p for social media, 1080p for your TV at home,, or 4K at 60fps for that buttery smooth project that you want to shine.[Backgrounds]â€¢ Apply and blend linear, radial, and mesh gradient backgrounds to your video. Riveo also gives you the freedom to create your own.__________Questions or feedback? Get support directly from the developer at hello@forgeandform.co. I created Riveo for you to develop professional videos without a big studio budget or in-house editor. Enjoy!ToS: https://forgeandform.co/appDocs/riveo/tosEn.htmlPrivacy Policy: https://forgeandform.co/appDocs/riveo/privacyPolicyEn.html

name: â€Fugue Machine Rubato
description: Demo available via TestFlight at fuguemachinerubato.com. Fugue Machine Classic users: see iOS App Store for discount bundle.Bend time. Automate notes. A single grid as a multi-dimensional musical canvas â€” for iPad, iPhone, and Mac.Fugue Machine Rubato dives deeper into the multi-playhead piano roll concept of Fugue Machine Classic by adding time-bending playheads, parameter automation, and much more.At the heart of the sequencer is a nonlinear time engine that lets playheads move with a natural â€” or surreal â€” feel. Unlike conventional sequencers, where time advances at a constant rate, time in this engine can expressively accelerate, decelerate, freeze, and change direction. Playheads are now free to swing, strum, bounce, move elastically, and more.Built upon the time engine is a robust parameter automation system with time-bending automation playheads and envelopes sculpted with points, curves, and shapes. Nearly everything can be automated â€” even the notes.Eight years in the making, Fugue Machine Rubato is rock-solid and absolutely packed with features.HIGHLIGHTSâ€¢ Bend time with curves, rates, and offsetsâ€¢ Automate notes and nearly everything elseâ€¢ Sculpt envelopes with curves and shapesâ€¢ Position playheads anywhere on the gridâ€¢ Play up to eight playheads at onceâ€¢ Apply note echoes per-playheadâ€¢ Arpeggiate notes from multiple playheadsâ€¢ Blend notes from multiple playheadsâ€¢ Offset, stack, spread, and invert pitchesâ€¢ Clamp, compress, and expand velocitiesâ€¢ Program drums via per-note Drum Trigsâ€¢ Route notes to up to eight MIDI outputsâ€¢ Organize patterns in nestable foldersâ€¢ Launch patterns quantized to the beatâ€¢ Revert state via auto-saved Snapshotsâ€¢ Learn contextually via popoversâ€¢ Explore ~150 built-in patternsâ€¢ Control via touch, keyboard, and cursorâ€¢ Resize Mac window at native resolutionCOMPATIBILITYFugue Machine Rubato supports iPad, iPhone, Mac, Ableton Link, MIDI, and AUv3* MIDI. With the included AUv3 MIDI plugin, you can run multiple instances of Fugue Machine Rubato within AUv3 host apps â€” like AUM, Logic Pro for iPad, Loopy Pro, and Cubasis.UNIVERSAL APP â€” ONE-TIME PURCHASEPay once and use on iPad, iPhone, and Mac.LEARN MORE â€” TRY A FREE DEMOTo learn more or try a free demo via TestFlight, visit fuguemachinerubato.com.

While most of the shipâ€™s inhabitants have reconciled themselves to a life lived aboard the sunken ship, Mareaux still works tirelessly to find a way for the ship to leave the planet and find a new, dryer home.But the weird, wonderful and diverse people of the FEDORA I keep Harold busy tooâ€¦ Until one fateful encounter plunges Harold into a world no one could have imagined - and one that may hold the key to Mareauxâ€™s re-launch plans.Join Harold as he explores a vibrant retro-future world in his quest to find the true meaning of â€˜homeâ€™.

description: If you see "Purchased" instead of "Get", sign out of the App Store in System Settings â€“> Apple Account â€“> Media & Purchases, then go back into the App Store signed out.If you are looking for an app to track deliveries on Mac, iPhone, iPad or Apple Watch - Parcel is the best choice for you.With this application you can promptly access tracking information for 300 delivery services, including DPD, Parcelforce, Evri, UK Mail, Yodel, Deutsche Post, Amazon Logistics, TNT, UPS, USPS, FedEx and many other postal services. Full list of supported carriers is available at: https://parcel.appTracking data is collected on our server, so you will get it right to your device with a click of a button. With unique carrier automatic recognition function, adding new delivery is just a matter of seconds.Push notifications provided by Parcel are more convenient than from any other app. They arrive simultaneously on your Mac and iOS devices. You can also locate your delivery on the map or manage your deliveries using Web Access (web.parcelapp.net) - easy and simple.Parcel utilizes the power of macOS to provide you the best possible user experience. You can use Spotlight to look for your deliveries and widget to add new deliveries or see expected deliveries for today or tomorrow (when there is an estimated delivery date available).Amazon integration in Parcel allows you to get your packages added automatically from your Amazon account. Once an order is shipped, it will appear in Parcel. This is done in a secure and privacy-friendly way with your credentials never leaving the device.Some features, such as push notifications and tracking more than 3 deliveries are limited to premium subscribers. Current price for the premium subscription is Â£4.49 per year, and may vary from country to country. Parcel's privacy policy, as well as subscription terms are available at https://parcel.app/privacy-with-terms.html.

description: ** Apple App Store Awards 2024 Winner â€“ Mac App of the Year **A qualifying Adobe Photoshop Lightroom subscription is required. Non-subscribers may try the product free for 7 days before incurring the monthly Lightroom subscription fee.Join millions of users who trust Adobe Photoshop Lightroom as their AI-assisted photo editor for editing, organizing, storing, and sharing their photos and videos across desktop, mobile, and web.â€¢ Lightroom offers powerful photo and video editing features in an easy-to-use interface.â€¢ Supercharge your workflow and image quality with features made possible by AI, like Denoise, Super Resolution, and one-click selections of your subject.â€¢ Fix lighting by editing exposure, highlights, and more with precision sliders. Edit colors with hue, saturation, luminance, and color grading.â€¢ Create your own presets or explore built-in presets for quick and easy photo looks with a single click.â€¢ Selectively adjust parts of your image with adaptive presets or masking options that give you full control.â€¢ Easily remove distractions and unwanted objects using the AI-powered Remove tool.â€¢ Edit your full-resolution photos anywhere â€” on mobile devices, the web, or your desktop. Edits on one device are automatically applied everywhere else.â€¢ Lightroomâ€™s popular photo editing can also be used with your videos. Apply presets, edit, trim, and retouch videos with the same tools you know and love.â€¢ Search your photos without ever having to tag anything.
